title: Chorizo Sausages
directions: Mix together the cubed pork and the cubed and ground fat. Add remaining ingredients except the sausage casings. Cover and refrigerate overnight. Stuff the casings, twisting and tying every 4 inches. Hang to dry at room temperature for 3 days, then refrigerate, loosely covered with wax paper, and continue to dry several more days before using. They will keep for a few weeks in the refrigerator and freeze well.
ingredients: 3/4 lb lean pork loin, cut in 1/2 inch cubes
1/4 lb pork fat, cut in cubes
1 tsp crushed dried red chili pepper
